# Concept Test Report: Allwyn TV Ad Concepts

## Test Overview

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **Concept Name** | Allwyn TV Ad Concepts |
| **Personas Tested** | 90 of 90 |
| **Processing Time** | 82.7s (~1.4 min) |
| **Generation Provider** | openai/gpt-4o |
| **Embedding Provider** | openai/text-embedding-3-small |
| **Vision Provider** | openai/gpt-4o |

---

## Overall Result: PASSED

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| **Composite Score** | 0.635 |
| **Threshold** | 0.55 |
| **Margin** | +0.085 |
| **Verdict** | **PASSED** (exceeded by 8.5%) |

---

## Criteria Breakdown

| Question | Weight | Raw Mean | Normalized | Contribution |
|----------|--------|----------|------------|--------------|
| want_to_know_more | 20% | 3.48 | 0.620 | 0.124 |
| memorability | 20% | 3.22 | 0.555 | 0.111 |
| research_intent | 20% | 3.37 | 0.593 | 0.119 |
| personal_fit | 20% | 4.06 | 0.765 | 0.153 |
| concept_preference | 20% | 3.56 | 0.640 | 0.128 |

---

## Key Insights

### Strengths

1. **personal_fit** (4.06) - Top 2 box: 72%

2. **concept_preference** (3.56) - Top 2 box: 0%

3. **want_to_know_more** (3.48) - Top 2 box: 2%


### Weaknesses

1. **research_intent** (3.37) - Bottom 2 box: 0%

2. **memorability** (3.22) - Bottom 2 box: 0%


---

## Metrics Summary

| Question | Mean | Median | Std Dev | Top 2 Box | Bottom 2 Box |
|----------|------|--------|---------|-----------|--------------|
| want_to_know_more | 3.48 | 3.59 | 0.32 | 2% | 0% |
| memorability | 3.22 | 3.15 | 0.35 | 2% | 0% |
| research_intent | 3.37 | 3.48 | 0.40 | 0% | 0% |
| personal_fit | 4.06 | 4.07 | 0.11 | 72% | 0% |
| concept_preference | 3.56 | 3.60 | 0.27 | 0% | 0% |

---

## Sample Responses

---

It makes me curious about how they balance these elements, but I'd want to know more specifics about their work cu..."

---

The idea of combining startup energy with firm stability is appealing, but the ad feels a bit generic and doesn't provide enough detail abou..."

## Conclusions
